price: Primjer Isaov doista je kod Allaha isti kao i primjer Ademov: od prašine ga je stvorio, a zatim mu rekao: "Budi!" i on bi!
arabic: إِنَّ مَثَلَ عِيسَىٰ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ ءَادَمَۖ خَلَقَهُۥ مِن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ قَالَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna mathala ʿīsā ʿinda al-lahi kamathali ādama khalaqahu min turābin thumma qāla lahu kun fayakūnu
